title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Partner Keynote with Dr. Ruba Borno
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 合作伙伴主题演讲，演讲嘉宾：Ruba Borno 博士
abstract: Join Dr. Ruba Borno, Vice President, Global Specialists and Partners, and special guests including a fireside chat with AWS CEO Matt Garman, as they reveal the science behind seemingly impossible customer transformations. In the agentic era, customers are leveraging partners as force multipliers—combining AWS's comprehensive solutions with deep domain expertise to create breakthrough outcomes. Witness extraordinary customer transformations that feel like magic, then discover the precise science and proven methodologies that make it all possible, giving you the blueprint to replicate this success.
abstract_cn: 加入 Ruba Borno 博士(全球专家与合作伙伴副总裁)和特邀嘉宾(包括与 AWS 首席执行官 Matt Garman 的炉边谈话),他们将揭示看似不可能的客户转型背后的科学原理。在智能体时代,客户正在利用合作伙伴作为力量倍增器——将 AWS 的综合解决方案与深厚的领域专业知识相结合,创造突破性成果。见证如魔法般非凡的客户转型,然后发现使这一切成为可能的精确科学和经过验证的方法论,为您提供复制这一成功的蓝图。
